translation.english: What? What?

translation.tagalog: Hello, good afternoon, Sir Victor Da. I'm a scambri for the day.
translation.english: Hello, good afternoon, Sir Victor. I'm calling today on behalf of Maya.

translation.tagalog: Ano to? Maya ba to? Maya?
translation.english: What is this? Maya? Maya?
Yes, sir.

translation.tagalog: Oo. Ano yan? Hanggang kailan yung ano?
translation.english: Okay. Until when is that?

translation.tagalog: Ah, wait lang po, Sir. Wait lang po.
translation.english: Ah, wait a moment, Sir. Please hold on.
What did they say?

translation.tagalog: Sir, ah, papakilala po muna ako. So, Sir, si Homer po ito, Sir, ng NMJ Collection.
translation.english: Sir, let me introduce myself first. I'm Homer from NMJ Collection.
What?

translation.tagalog: I'm calling, Sir, on behalf of Kaya Bank.
translation.english: I'm calling, Sir, on behalf of Maya Bank.
Okay.

translation.tagalog: Naman ko lang din kayo, Sir, na this call is recorded. So, Sir, for account security purposes lang po,
translation.english: Just informing you, Sir, that this call is recorded. So, for account security purposes...
Okay.

translation.tagalog: I ask you, yung last four-digit po, Sir, na nakaregister sa Maya account, choice 4895, tama po.
translation.english: May I ask the last four digits registered to your Maya account, is it 4895?
Correct.

translation.tagalog: Ah, po, kasi, Sir, yung sa system namin, Sir, meron pa po kayong outstanding balance, Sir, na 3,271.55,
translation.english: Because in our system, Sir, you still have an outstanding balance of 3,271.55 pesos.
I agree with that.

translation.tagalog: 3,271.55 centavos po, Sir, sa Maya credit ninyo. Then, one day pass yun na po siya, Sir. Need po kasi, Sir, ng immediate settlement, Sir, today.
translation.english: 3,271.55 pesos, Sir, on your Maya Credit. It's already one day past due. It requires immediate settlement today, Sir.

translation.tagalog: Ha? Wala eh. Wala pang pang setel eh. Pwede bang installment lang? Ano yan?
translation.english: Huh? I don't have money to settle. Can I pay in installments? What is this?

translation.tagalog: Sir, hindi po siya, Sir, applicable, Sir, sa account ninyo, Sir, na magsisettle po kayo, Sir, ng installment. Kasi po, Sir, yung account nyo po kasi, Sir, once po kasi, Sir, na full payment nyo po siya, Sir, possible for re-loan naman po siya kagad.
translation.english: Sir, unfortunately, installment payments are not applicable to your account. Because once you settle the full amount, you may be eligible for a reloan.
For what?

translation.tagalog: Possible for re-loan naman po siya kagad.
translation.english: It’s possibly eligible for reloan immediately.
No, I’m not asking about reloaning.
Hmm? Okay, Sir.

translation.tagalog: Like, sige, bigyan mo example ah. Kunyari, mabayaran ko yung ano, full amount.
translation.english: Let’s say I pay the full amount. Right? I take a loan to pay my debt to you. So this reloan you're talking about, how much will I get?
It depends again on Maya, Sir. They’re the ones who determine that.

translation.tagalog: Di ba? Utang ako para bayaran ko yung utang ko sa inyo. So, yung re-loan na sinasabi mo, magkano yung marire-loan ko?
translation.english: That’s exactly it.

translation.tagalog: Depende po kasi sir ulit kay Maya po yun sir Kasi po sila po yung
translation.english: I need to know, because I might end up with higher interest. If I pay now and get the same amount for reloan, what’s the point? I’d rather pay monthly, at least it's guaranteed. And the due dates are too quick.
But Sir, it really is possible for reloan immediately, it’s already in the system.
No, that’s not the point.

translation.tagalog: Kailangan ko malaman eh. Kasi baka mas dumagdag pa yung ano ko, yung interest ko. Kapag binayasan ko, tapos, yung ipapare-loan sa akin, ganun din. So, yung re-loan ko, so, I'd rather pay it in increments na as bit sure-voll sigurado. Kasi ang binis nung ano eh, yung due date. Yung isa pa yun.
translation.english: The reloan amount hasn’t updated. That’s not it. Besides, I use it for medicine.

translation.tagalog: Pero ito naman po kasi sir possible for reload naman po siya kagad sir So nakasystem
translation.english: You know what I mean?
Like for example...
Okay, because my medicine is every month.

translation.tagalog: Hindi lang nak-update yung re-loan number eh. Hindi yun. Hindi yung botadka kasi I use it for medicine eh.
translation.english: So paying in installment would really help me.
You get me?
Sorry Sir, the Maya Credit generation is system-based.
Can’t that be addressed?
Can’t something be done? I’m really sick.
Also, I don’t have work. I’m unemployed now.
Okay, Sir. I’ll give you until Monday to settle.
I won’t be able to pay the full amount. I’m already telling you. I really can’t — even if I wanted to, I can’t.

translation.tagalog: okay yung medicine ko kasi is every month.
translation.english: Okay Sir, I’ll just note here that you won’t be able to settle.
That’s why I’m saying I can pay monthly. We could create a payment plan.

translation.tagalog: So, makakatulong, makakatulong sa akin yung payment na ano, po installment.
translation.english: Why not just note it down?
Sir, that’s part of your terms and conditions. Your account isn’t eligible for partial monthly settlements. Also, your account is accumulating 0.17% in penalties and charges daily.
Exactly, that’s why I’m asking you to stop the interest accumulation. I already declared I’m unemployed, I have no income, and I’m in a life-or-death medical condition.

translation.tagalog: Sorry Naka system generation Kasi sir yung pag ano nung Maya credit po ninyo sir
translation.english: Which is thrombocytopenia. I can provide documentation about it.

translation.tagalog: Eh, di ba ba pwedeng i-ano yun, tawag dito?
translation.english: That’s why I’m really struggling.
Alright Sir, just call Maya's customer service directly.

translation.tagalog: Gawa ng paraan? Kasi, meron naman talaga akong sakit eh.
translation.english: Okay, fine.
Alright Sir, I’ve noted here that you won’t be able to settle.

translation.tagalog: Tsaka wala akong work. Wala akong work na yun.
translation.english: Thank you, and bless you.

translation.tagalog: Sige, sir. Bibigyan ko po kayo, sir, hanggang Monday po, sir, para po masettle niyo po siya, sir.
translation.english: Get well soon, Sir.

translation.tagalog: Hindi ko kakayanin yung full amount eh. Sinasabi ko na nga sa'yo eh. Hindi ko talaga, kung still nga man, alam mo yun, hindi ko talaga kakayanin dyan na ano.
translation.english: I can’t handle the full amount, you know. I’m already telling you, I really can’t, even if it’s still the same, you know, I really can’t manage it there.
Alright, sir. I...

translation.tagalog: Ano man gusto bumili ng katawang, ano na?
translation.english: Whoever wants to buy a body, what now?

translation.tagalog: Sige, sir. Inanot ko na lang po dito, sir, na hindi pa rin po kayo makakapag-settle, sir.
translation.english: Alright, sir. I just noted here, sir, that you still can’t settle, sir.

translation.tagalog: Kaya ako mag-suresell in installment every month. Di ba? Mag-ano rin lang tayo ng payment plan.
translation.english: That’s why I’ll sell it in installments every month. Right? We’ll just set up a payment plan.
Because...
That’s it, that’s all. What am I,
No, sir...
Why just note it down?

translation.tagalog: Sir, nasa terms and condition niyo po yun, sir. Hindi po siya applicable, sir, sa account ninyo, sir, na mag-settle po kayo every month, sir, ng partial. Kasi po, sir, itong account niyo, sir, is nag-accumulate po siya, sir, everyday, sir, ng 0.17% po siya, sir, na penalties and charges.
translation.english: Sir, it’s in your terms and conditions, sir. It’s not applicable, sir, to your account, sir, that you settle monthly, sir, with partial payments. Because, sir, this account of yours, sir, accumulates, sir, every day, sir, at 0.17%, sir, in penalties and charges.

translation.tagalog: Ano? Kaya nga eh, sana nga eh, ano eh, tigil nyo na yung accumulation ng interest. Kasi nga, gini-declare ko na nga, na I, I, I'm unemployed, I have no source of income, and I have a life and death medical condition,
translation.english: What? That’s why, I wish, you know, stop the accumulation of interest already. Because, I’m already declaring that I, I, I’m unemployed, I have no source of income, and I have a life-and-death medical condition.
No, sir...

translation.tagalog: which is dapenia. I can, I can give you, well,
translation.english: which is dyspnea. I can, I can give you, well,
No, sir...
documentation regarding this.
No, sir...

translation.tagalog: Kaya, I'm really having a hard time.
translation.english: That’s why I’m really having a hard time.
No, sir... Alright, sir.
If I’m just being warned.

translation.tagalog: Ganito na na po, sir. Tawag na lang po kayo, sir, sa customer service po, sir, ni Maya.
translation.english: Here’s the thing, sir. Just call, sir, the customer service, sir, of Maya.
Yes. Alright.

translation.tagalog: Ganito na na lang po, sir, yung makakapag...
translation.english: Here’s the thing, sir, the one that can...
Yes, alright.

translation.tagalog: Sige, po, sir, inanot ko na lang dito po, sir, na hindi po kayo makakapag-settle. pagseto. Sir, thank you po, sir.
translation.english: Alright, sir, I just noted here, sir, that you can’t settle, sir. Thank you, sir.

translation.tagalog: Fakantong salamat to si Kapolat Iente
translation.english: Thank you to Kapolat Iente (nonsensical, possibly a name or garbled text)
Get well soon, sir.

translation.english: So, that’s the strength of the resident’s arrangement there. Pay the next lady. I don’t want my stupid scissors anymore.
